channel.title: Comments on: For Sale: One Interesting House

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I stand by my creative use of language.
item.content:encoded: I stand by my creative use of language.

item.title: By: Daddyo
item.dc:creator: Daddyo
item.description:
"drove" of trees? What is that Malcom, a herd of trees you drive to Dunsinane? I think you meant a "grove" of trees. Just shows you, you're never too old to have your writing edited by Dad.
BTW, I like Little Jack and sent the Shit box on to my camping mates.
item.content:encoded:
“drove” of trees? What is that Malcom, a herd of trees you drive to Dunsinane? I think you meant a “grove” of trees. Just shows you, you’re never too old to have your writing edited by Dad.

BTW, I like Little Jack and sent the Shit box on to my camping mates.
